text: I get the sense that Cate Le Bon is a fan of The Whole Love and Star Wars. Nobody else makes tracks like this. Making me fall in love with this band all over again. Thank you Cate.
author: Patrick Hawkinson

text: They’ve been dialling it in for a while. Nevertheless, their earlier albums remain groundbreaking works of art.
author: L L

text: such a greatly consistent band. loved them since YHF
author: Imalrightma

text: Have tickets to see Wilco in October and I could not be more excited. Such an amazing band and they are still putting out great music.
author: Ryan Potter

text: This is about Cousin Greg and Tom Wambsgans, right?
author: Autumn Winters

text: Le Bon influences strong in this one. Headed back to the offbeat, funny count, foot tapping sounds of the past.
author: Bren Reidy

text: Hope there will be some good melodies in the album. Obviously they are not on this one.
author: M C

text: Its a bop. Thank you Wilco.
author: A_RagingRodent

text:
John Lennon flows through
Jeff tweedy, and what Mike watt
When the lights come on
author: Robert Hale

text: I really liked it.
author: Eric

text: turn it up yeaahhh
author: Heath Tavrides

text: Between "Evicted" (with its hints of "Raspberry Beret" and "Kamera") and "Cousin," I'm not yet sold on this new album. These songs are both midtempo without any good hooks. Kinda disappointed...
author: Michael Aushenker

text: Love it. This song is about Trump. What a time to be brave. The dead awake in RED waves. Trump 2024!
author: Scratchin' with Donnie

text: Can’t wait to see you guys in two weeks!! 🎉
author: Josh Leeming

text:
Any insight not the background of this song? The name seems like an obvious reference to The Bear. 
I haven’t been this excited about a Wilco album in a long time and I’m always excited about Wilco albums!
author: Lucus

text: YES!!!!
author: Lynda Kraar

text: If I was in a band I’d want it to be as creative and surprising as Wilco.  Great stuff.👍
author: Doctor Dave

text: Wilco❤ Tweety in a bromance with Offerman❤  Life is good.
author: Betsy Lindsay

text: 2 for 2 with the singles. Love the angular vibes. Cate Le Bon was a perfect choice to work with.
author: Meaty Tofu

text: It's a grower!!!!!
author: John Madden

text: As always, I had to listen to it at least three times to be be carried away by  the brilliance of a new Wilco song. It's five times now and I love it.
author: Albert Florian

text: Wilco does indeed love us, baby.
author: Joshua Ball

text: Hell yeah, another great tune! I wish you guys would come back to ACL again, it's been too long!!!
author: Eric Gutierrez

text: o som do Wilco cresce muito quando o Glenn tem mais liberdade para criar. a sessão rítmica ficou foda, uma vibe meio Combat Rock do The Clash. sonzão
author: Leo Trindade

text: Vamos Wilco todavía!!!!. Jeff Tweedy, a real Genius!!!!
author: Jorge Patricio Rodríguez

text: shu primo!
author: Juan Diego Cortés

text: Yum!
author: dubmoth76

text: great to finally hear Wilco in more open and wide soundstage
author: Moiz Audio

text: I'm so glad these guys are still around and continuing to pump out incredible tunes.
author: Lance Vance

text: The Cate Le Bon is strong here. So good to hear unexpected bridges/hooks in Wilco tracks again.
author: Tristan Louth-Robins

text: Hey primO !! Long time no see

text: Hola wilco

text: Heard, Jeff!
